text: White Trash, Two Heebs and a Bean is the fourth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. White Trash, Two Heebs and a Bean was released on November 5, 1992. The producer of the album was Donnell Cameron, NOFX. The original album title was going to be White Trash, Two Kikes, and a Spic but guitar player Eric Melvin changed it after feeling guilty. It is also the first album with guitar player El Hefe. ==Songs== ==References== Category:1992 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: White Trash, Two Heebs and a Bean
